Reviews.Title: good tv for the pricw
Reviews.Author: mvwcpa
Reviews.Content: In response to the above review about it being 60hz not 120hz,I have pasted a copy of an email I received from westinghouse regarding this issue:I understand you had a question in regards to the 120hz feature of your Television. The model you provided, the CW46T9FW is indeed a 120hz model TV. We've realized our customers may be confused by the TV's on screen display which shows 60hz. The purpose of the on screen display is to show information of the signal being received by the TV from your video source. For example, it may display the following video resolutions from a cable/satellite receiver, 480i/p, 720p, or 1080i/p.The TV will also display the incoming refresh rate from your source. Historically, average refresh rates are 60hz-72hz, however, 60hz is the standard for most video sources. Although you see 60hz on the information window, the TV processes and converts all content to 120hz to improve motion estimation and compensation.Please let me know if you have any questions.Thank You, Eric Gamboa | Sr. Customer Support SpecialistWestinghouse Digital, LLCIt is a good value and a good tv. And no, I don't work for westinghouse!

Reviews.Title: Has some issues...
Reviews.Author: bmstew
Reviews.Content: I got this set on sale, and was very happy with it at first. However, after watching it for a few days, I realized a couple of things: first of all, blacks almost looked purple, and were not very deep and were extremely prone to artifacts. Second of all, when watching live sports, there was a very slight stutter whenever the camera panned. It wasn't much, but it was enough to drive me crazy everytime I watched any sports. Unfortunately, I was dissatisfied and returned the TV, and got an LG. Much happier now. This TV would be good for people that aren't too picky about picture quality, but if you're a sports enthusiast or videophile, I'd look elsewhere. Also, there are basically no picture calibration options, so if you're unhappy with how the picture looks, you're basically stuck with it.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Wena L
Reviews.Content: We ordered this tv from amazon and have been using it everyday. Great quality for an awesome price. Can't find a deal like this anywhere else.Came in pretty quick too

Reviews.Title: Incredible for the money!
Reviews.Author: zeerico1
Reviews.Content: Pleasantly surprised to have this nice television delivered to the front door. (Actually the delivery-person was kind enough to go around back and leave the TV on the lanai, since we were out running errands.) Removed TV from packing box, attached antenna, plugged in power, and away we go! (Really) Great high def picture (with an antenna!)

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Terry Williams
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great TV.  Picture quality was better than expected sound I will say was just good not what I would call stereo quality.

Reviews.Title: Mom Loves It
Reviews.Author: Vivian B. "Vivian B."
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for my mom. She liked it and the fact it arrived the day after I ordered it for her.  The only thing is, why do you need an activation code to scan OTA channels???? Getting the code was no piece of cake either.

Reviews.Title: Money well spent!!
Reviews.Author: jburge09
Reviews.Content: At first I was hesitant to purchase this tv because of some poor reviews, but I am so glad I decided to buy it. It is sooo worth the money. The volume is great, picture is nice, it's very easy to use, and it's way cheaper than name brand tv's that offer the same quality. You will not be disappointed with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: It was OK for the kids room at 1st
Reviews.Author: Skip
Reviews.Content: It was OK for the kids room not a bad picture. But now 70 days later the picture is turning blue from the sides to the center of the screen. Not good I asked for a replacement or my money back from Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Mumsy "CEDodge"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my purchase.  The picture is really sharp, the colors are excellent, and the television does what it is supposed to.  What more could I ask for?

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Ryanms3
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly. Easy set up and great picture. Cannot go wrong for a 46 in at this price. Love all the HDMI ports also.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Sandie
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for our room and for the price, the sound is awesome. The picture could be a little better. It tends to look a little fuzzy when things and people on the tv aren't close up. But, it is crystal clean when it zooms in on people's faces. Overall, great product for the price. I just received it today, so let's see how it holds up in the next few weeks. I'll be sure to update if there are any pros and cons I've discovered.

Reviews.Title: A tremedous TV in all respects
Reviews.Author: Richard Tittle
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with the price, quality and delivery of the product. It is a beautiful TV in appearance. The product was exactly as described, and I am exremely satisfied, and would recommend to everyone. The TV was packaged very well and arrived in perfect condition even though the packade was damaged in a few areas. The TV was easy to set up. I experienced none of the short comings that were in several reviews, The picture is bright, crystal clear, and no ajustments were needed. Beautiful and accurate "skin" tones, and vibrant color across the spectrum. I was dreading the sound quality from several reviews. I assure you, the quality of the sound is certainly good if not excellant. This thing is "loud" and clear. It even has good bass response, and I have not had to change any settings out of the box. To say I am pleased with this purchase is an understatement. I am a perfectionist in many ways, and could complain about the slow response changing channels, the smallest buttons on the remote. I run direct cable TV without a "box", so I use the supplied remote. This two elements pale in comparison of the performance of the picture and sound quality, which is why we buy this entertinment product. If the picture was any brighter, I would have to wear sun glasses. The only thing I would want in addition would be a USB port for picture viewing, however my Blu-Ray has a USB and an SD card reader. I have the Blu-Ray player connected via an HMDI cable, and it is a perfect picture. Did I mention I am totally satisfied with this CW46FW TV? Thanks Westinghouse and Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the money
Reviews.Author: Thomas Howard
Reviews.Content: Simple to operate, great color and definition and works perfectly with my Apple TV. It's a little slow to turn on and makes you wonder "ok so are you on?" There's no noise or charm that rings when it comes on like more expensive TVs. But really does that matter? No. It's a great tv  regardless of its price and its my second Westinghouse and they continue to impress me. Would recommend this TV to anyone

Reviews.Title: Good t.v., could not beat the price.
Reviews.Author: lo0pz
Reviews.Content: First i'd like to say, the price of this item was second to none.  I paid 348 for this t.v., and it was well worth it.The t.v. had a small technical issue when i first got it.  It would turn on and you could hear the sound, but the picture would not come on.  This happened very infrequently, and seemed to stop over time.  Also, the sound quality of the t.v. is not great, I mean it's not horrible, and you can hear it clearly enough, but it does not have alot of volume to it, and can get static-sounding if you try to turn it up too loud.  This is where the t.v. loses a star.However, i gave this 4 stars because of the awesomeness of some of it's features.  For example, you have the option to select between home use and retail display, using retail display will give you better picture quality, while home use gives you better energy conservation, so that was a pretty decent feature right off the bat.  The picture quality and color on this t.v. are as good as any that I have seen, the display is awesome, and it also works well as a monitor if you plug your computer into it.  It has plenty of hdmi, and component cable slots so plugging your devices in is easy, and accessable.  And did I mention the price? because the price was awesome, though I see it's not available now for the same price I had.It also comes with an extended warranty through westinghouse.  And from reviews I have seen elsewhere, they seem to be a great company in regards to honoring their warranty.All in all, dont let the lack of high end name brand desuade you from this t.v., it's of great quality, and has a couple of flaws, but ultimately is awesome if you get a real good price on it like I did.

Reviews.Title: bad reviews but this tv rocks
Reviews.Author: donielle jabbar
Reviews.Content: i was a little skeptical about purchasing this tv after reading some of the reviews but i decided to give it a shot since it was on sale boy am i happy i made this purchase this tv works great and the sound is pretty darn good as well

Reviews.Title: excellent picture for the price
Reviews.Author: Arthur T. Bliss
Reviews.Content: Got a super deal on this tv at Tiger Direct and am very happy with the tv.  However the remote has some issues.  The volume control does not work much of the time.  I have to press it multiple times just to get a response.  The batteries are good so that is not the problem.  That is why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.  For $346 for a 46 inch lcd tv it is hard to complain about anything.

Reviews.Title: Bad Pixels/poor base design
Reviews.Author: tumyeto32 "tumyeto32"
Reviews.Content: The first concern was the poorly designed base.  If you are going to wall mount, it wound not be a problem but the TV swayed back and forth with little force. (It was ridiculously designed and not stable).  We had it on a table and had to move it because I was afraid if someone bumped the table, the TV would flip off.  After re-situating and plugging it in, there were bad pixels in the screen.  Whether this occurred from an insult incurred during shipping or a defect, I can't confirm.  This TV is also very heavy.  When we returned it and bought another model (same size) we noticed that the other model was much, much lighter.  In going back to the comment about the TV instability of the base, it could have been that the base was not large/heavy enough to perform its function for such a deadweighted TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Westinghouse CW46T9FW 46-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV (Black)]] For the price you can't beat this TV ! The picture is crystal clear. The audio is more then adequate. My living room is 25ft. by 30ft with vaulted ceilings and I haven't had to go higher then 20% of the volume max. I did max out the volume with an AC/DC video and the speakers did well. Setup is as easy as it gets. In regards to the 120hz claim ,I watched NBA playoffs,Baseball and Hockey. Hockey ,the fastest game in my opinion, stuttered a little bit. Baseball and Basketball were perfect. I also purchased a Square Trade 4 year warranty for 57 dollars not because of TV quality fears but because I always buy a Square Trade warranty for anything electronic. They cover your purchase for 4 years no questions asked, Period !!!.My purchase total was 407.00. That gets me a 46 inch 1080p with 4 year full coverage warranty. FANTASTIC !!!!!Get this TV before it's sold out or the price goes up. You won't be disappointed I promise.

Reviews.Title: Very bad quality TV
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: THE TV BROKE DOWN THREE MONTH AFTER PURCHASE AND THE CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS!!THE TV BROKE DOWN THREE MONTH AFTER PURCHASE AND THE CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS!!

Reviews.Title: Nice, but lacks features for tweakeers
Reviews.Author: matus
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great machine. Does not have all the bells and whistles but nice none the less.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE company...don't buy from them
Reviews.Author: reilly marie wyman
Reviews.Content: This has been a long and extensive process... I received the television damaged and they took months to get back to me. When we finally were able to talk it was a joke, they told me if i wanted it fixed that i would have to ship it to the repair shop in California... I live in Wisconsin...the shipping was going to be 300 dollars. So now i am stuck with a broken tv. Westinghouse has the worst customer service ever!

Reviews.Title: TV Warranty Thought
Reviews.Author: Nancy G
Reviews.Content: The was delivered and worked great. After about 3 months lines began developing on the screen.  I wanted to return it but after 30 days I could not return it to Amazon.  I contacted Westinghouse and they were very helpful with the warranty.  The only problem was that I had to package and ship it to California.  What I want people to be aware of is if you have a warranty problem and have to ship it back to the manufacturer it can be expensive.  It cost $150.00 to ship it to California from Michigan which more than negated the good original purchase price.  When buying electronics you are always taking a gamble.  In the future I will probably pay a few bucks more and purchase TV's from local stores that I can return the product to.

Reviews.Title: dim screen
Reviews.Author: Ilya Pirkin
Reviews.Content: The screen is pretty dim, only suitable for watching in a dark room. Overall quality and feature are Ok (as expected)

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: D. W. Cassidy "endeffecter"
Reviews.Content: Bought mine 2 years ago for $550. I did not mind the slight uneven plastics and slight screen imperfections. But the Tv screen went black after 18 months, seems to be a common problem. I've bought cheap electronics that have lasted more than 20 years, so i am not pleased to have to buy another TV

Reviews.Title: eh
Reviews.Author: G. Kelly
Reviews.Content: ended up using mine as a big computer monitor.  Has a line of dead and area of yellow pixels.  I got used to it.  I'm on the fence whether this was a 'good deal'.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Dane
Reviews.Content: This tv has been good so far. We watch blurays and cable in hd and it's perfectly sufficient. I recommend it for someone who wants a bigger tv for a lower price. The first one I got was cracked on the top of the screen, but since i'm with prime, i was able to send it back for a replacement, no charge and no questions asked. The second one was perfect. If you get this, I would recommend that you carefully look all over the screen and housing BEFORE you start attaching the base and hooking it up to your devices...I didn't notice the screen was cracked until after I had it all set up :(

Reviews.Title: A great value
Reviews.Author: R.O.C.K.
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this tv.  There is a glare if you have it where there is light overhead and for my taste it had some color issues that needed OCD fine tuning, but other than that, amazing!

Reviews.Title: Good Value Excellent Picture
Reviews.Author: Ricky G Hassanali
Reviews.Content: Got a great deal on Memorial Day sale. Picture is excellent. TV is light weight. No regrets! Buy it now!

Reviews.Title: Fair value for $400
Reviews.Author: Michael Noonan
Reviews.Content: Westinghouse isn't a well-known brand for TV's, more for kitchen and laundry appliances.  The TV performs well.  3 were purchased for a sports-bar install, one had to be returned, due to a grouping of about 120 stuck pixels, looked like someone had sprayed something on the screen.  Amazon refunded, rather than replacing, as they were out of stock.  Walmart carries these TV's for the same price.

Reviews.Title: picture
Reviews.Author: vision247
Reviews.Content: first tv was broken but within 2 days new one was here for replacement. Second tv is great but i did figure out that with no hd box picture is not a good. Hd box made all the difference it works and looks great

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: d
Reviews.Content: This Tv is excellent, Clear Picture, quick response to channel change, nice sound too.  I have now bought 2 of these!

Reviews.Title: NOT 120 hz as advertized
Reviews.Author: david hoskins
Reviews.Content: this tv is advertised as 120hz but it is really only 60hz.. when I saw the same tv with the same model number on the walmart web site for the same price I knew something was not right.  Long story short after some investigation it is only 60hz. not exactly what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: very good buy
Reviews.Author: Debbie Stockburger
Reviews.Content: I wanted a bigger tv, and I got it. The picture is very nice. It was well packaged, just as if I bought it from a store.

Reviews.Title: Great product at a great price!
Reviews.Author: Ernest L. Hatley "nyecop"
Reviews.Content: First of all I would like to say that if you need a new flat screen HD TV Amazon is the way to go. Not only did they destroy Wall marts prices but with the Amazon Prime 2 day free shipping deal I ordered my TV at about 1:30 AM on a Thursday and it was delivered the next Friday! As for the quality of the TV I have no complaints it works GREAT!

Reviews.Title: great price and all around great deal
Reviews.Author: joey dyson
Reviews.Content: I'am very happy with this product I have always been married or dateing someone with kids si I've never had the extra income to splurge on myself , But this t.v makes up for all the times I never splurged .... The only down fall of this t.v is the lack of A.V hook ups . I have a surround sound plus my satilite box and my x-box 360 which is too much so If you get this t.v make sure you order the 4 way A.V box with it than you will have every thing you need ... Enjoy...............................J.D from VT

Reviews.Title: Tv looks great when it's working
Reviews.Author: Frame
Reviews.Content: I received my second Tv yesterday. The first started ghosting one morning and wouldn't produce a clear image. I am hoping this one lasts more than 30 days. Amazon was great about returning it. I had a new one the next day.The TV itself has great sound and great picture when it's working. The 120hz spec is false though my TV is 60hz.

Reviews.Title: Hey! It's not bad!
Reviews.Author: Jacob
Reviews.Content: I've never had anything but tube TVs. I desperately wanted to upgrade to something slim, sleek, pretty, and with lots of available connections. I shopped for weeks. After finding this deal, I went for it. Great price for a large TV! I wasn't looking for amazing, life-like picture. Just something that lets you see the screen as you sit on the other side of the room. The blacks are not very strong. Some mixed dark and light scenes are pixely in the dark areas. The sound seemed good for the 30 seconds it was on until I plugged in my stereo. PS I've had this for about 4 months.There is an annoying compatibility problem however. In my old TV, I plugged my bluray player into my home entertainment system via HDMI, and then the HES into the TV via HDMI. The video was transferred to the TV and the sound came through the entertainment system's speakers. Very nice. But this connection does not work on this TV. I can plug them in separately (the HES is a DVD player combo), both devices must be directly plugged into the TV. If I use the Middle-Man-Method, the TV says "Unsupported Mode." I have researched and read this happens sometimes with this brand of TVs for other devices including PS3s. I suppose it is a firmware problem than can be upgraded, and yet the company's website does not provide and firmware downloads. As far as I know, there is no way around this. Oh well. So now I use the DVD player for awesome sound, and the Bluray player for Bluray discs and online streaming. I have the TV's outward audio plugged into my small stereo for better sound when using the Bluray or my Gamecube. I believe I bought this when it was around $350 or so, and I have seen it has gone up. If you are not too picky like me and this price goes back down, I recommend getting this TV

Reviews.Title: Such a Deal
Reviews.Author: Regor
Reviews.Content: Quick delivery.  No problems setting up.  Picture is very nice, even when viewing non-HD channels.  Sound is OK, not great, may purchase a sound bar or something.  It does take more than a few seconds to power up and display the broadcast, almost like I remember TV's did when I was a kid. If using around small kids I'd suggest mounting as opposed to using the stand it comes with as it is not rock solid.  I bought another for my mom within a few days and she is quite happy with it also.  Very good deal at $348 and no sales tax or delivery.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: T. Shannon
Reviews.Content: Some of the other posts have talked about picture quality. It's true that compared to higher end, more expensive sets, the picture is very average, we purchased this set to replace a rear projection HD set that was about 10 years old. Now, compared to that set, this is light years better. I was very pleased to be able to get a 46" set at such a low price.

Reviews.Title: its pretty nice, works
Reviews.Author: Reginald Bryant "war on pirating....lost"
Reviews.Content: We have it set up in our living room and its a very nice size for the price, but a comparable vizio would be better recommended.

Reviews.Title: Falsely advertised: NOT 120Hz
Reviews.Author: Alex Evans "Alex"
Reviews.Content: So far I have contacted Westinghouse 3 times to ask about the 120Hz feature on the television to give them a chance to address the fact nowhere in the menus, manual, anywhere is there reference to 120Hz or a 120Hz feature toggle present in other 120Hz TVs. They have not answered even once. I guess the person who reviewed and did get a reply was lucky. However, I can tell you the response is a complete lie, there is no way this TV converts everything to 120Hz, it just doesn't display 120Hz.I have seen a lot of debate about this TV online as to whether it is 120Hz or not, I am pretty adept with electronics and I can tell you, this is NOT a 120Hz television. 120Hz televisions actually upscale 60Hz signals (as currently there are no widely available 120Hz sources), and you can visually tell this is happening in the picture (check out a local BestBuy and they will show you a 120Hz TV side by side with a regular 60Hz TV). Normally in televisions with this feature, there is an option in the menus to turn the feature on or off (as sometimes for certain sources such as sports, the 120Hz upscaling looks bad).So unless this TV is the only one in it's class (or in the consumer market for that matter) that can actually display a true 120Hz signal, this is falsely advertised as a 120Hz TV. There is no 120Hz upscaling feature anywhere. My parents have a smaller 19" Westinghouse and I was impressed by it's price and quality, but I am very disappointed in Westinghouse for lying about it's television's features.In conclusion, if this set happens to be the same price or cheaper than other sets, it's a good buy as far as sound quality and picture, although not 120Hz it's above average slightly in those respects. However, that only warrants an extra star, because it's only worth one star advertized as a 120Hz television since it is NOT 120Hz.I hope that Westinghouse will address this issue, at that point I would be happy to update my review with the results.

Reviews.Title: For the Price
Reviews.Author: James K. Blouin
Reviews.Content: The picture looks great.  The speakers are pretty bad they crackle when turned up.  But if you hook up surround it's not an issue.  The base is pretty lame you have to screw it on, i've never seen that before. For $400 it's a great tv. I was surprised bc i figured it was  a westinghouse POS, but it seems legit. If your on a budget or just cheap as hell, this tv is what's up

Reviews.Title: So far So Good...
Reviews.Author: Happy Dad
Reviews.Content: Bought this model at the store. Was VERY iffy about it but I needed a TV like now on a SMALL budget. It's big and the quality is pretty good. It is not 120hz. It is 60hz. But for 429.99 I can not complain!
